DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control trial conduct November 2015 May 2016 112 participant people diagnose schizophrenia . Participants age 18 year older Diagnostic Statistical Manual ( DSM-V ) schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder outpatient mental health clinic Jordan , randomly assign participant either receive 6 week booklet form intervention face face discussion , treatment usual ( TAU ) ( intervention , n = 56 ) , TAU ( control , n = 56 ) . Participants assess baseline , immediately post-intervention ( post-treatment1 ) three month follow-up . The primary outcome measure change helplessness score . Secondary outcome PDwS psychiatric symptom , recovery rate quality life .
